mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.pub_time, a.news_title, a.news_content, a.news_type, a.news_link, b.name as publisher FROM news a LEFT join user b ON a.student_num = b.student_num WHERE a.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY a.pub_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (student_num, news_title,news_content,news_type, news_link) VALUES (#{studentNum}, #{newsTitle},#{newsContent},#{newsType}, #{newsLink})
